dcterms:creator: N. Potyka
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating arguments in weighted bipolar argumentation frameworks, focusing on continuous dynamical systems.
dcterms:title: Quadratic Energy (QE)

dcterms:creator: L. Amgoud
J. Ben-Naim
dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating arguments in weighted bipolar graphs, focusing on the evaluation of arguments based on their support and attack relations.
dcterms:title: Restricted Euler-based (REB)

dcterms:creator: A. Rago
F. Toni
M. Aurisicchio
P. Baroni
dcterms:description: A dataset for discontinuity-free decision support using quantitative argumentation debates, focusing on the evaluation of arguments without discontinuities.
dcterms:title: Discontinuity-Free Quantitative Argumentation Debates (DF-QuAD)
